thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Brooks Automation Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.23

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Brooks Automation Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.23
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Brooks Automation Inc:
* BROOKS AUTOMATION REPORTS RESULTS OF FISCAL FIRST QUARTER OF 2018, ENDED DECEMBER 31, 2017
* SEES Q2 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.24 TO $0.32 * Q1 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.32 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.23 * SEES Q2 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.33 TO $0.41 * SEES Q2 2018 REVENUE $195 MILLION TO $205 MILLION * Q1 REVENUE ROSE 18 PERCENT TO $189 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.31, REVENUE VIEW $184.9 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.34, REVENUE VIEW $189.6 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
